title.narrative: As an impact maker in the development of the Horn of Africa

description.narrative: The aim is to increase awareness understanding and capacity of the target groups on development issues in Somalia and in general on the Horn of Africa. The project incorporates both communications and global education elements. The aim is to emphasize posi tive development in the Horn of Africa build on the capacity of individuals to make an impact in the development of the area and make use of communications to strengthen networks between Finland and the Horn of Africa. During the project the online Horn of Africa Journal will be published newsletters will be sent out and an international seminar will take place annually. Additionally emphasis is placed on informing the general public on current events related to the Horn of Africa and its diasporas through social media the Finnish Somalia Network website press releases and the Somali language media. Also vibrant cultural Horn of Africa events will be organized annually. The Network works closely with Kepa the umbrella organization for Finnish civil society o rganizations under the Southern Voices platform by organizing thematic events on the development in the Horn of Africa. The Network also cooperates with the Organization Incubator in their project ?Immigrants in the development cooperation? (2015-2018) to support diaspora organizations. Under global education the project aims at increasing the knowledge of youth on development cooperation in the Horn of Africa and further strengthens their active participation in the civil society. The main partners in the project are R3 ? The Immigrant youth support association? and Sorasod as well as youth centers in Helsinki and Vantaa. During the project a selected group of youth receive training on communications in a workshop by using rights based approach and empoweri ng methods and on thematic concepts related to development cooperation. Also meetings with stakeholders and experts on development cooperation are organized. The youth have the chance to contribute to the editing of the Horn of Africa online journal and pl an program for a cultural event.The Somali diaspora acts as a stakeholder group that helps in the implementation of the project.
